item.title: ROP: ret2libc Attack -Protostar6
item.description: Bypassing stack pointer restrictions to gain arbitrary code execution # Protostar is a series of beginner binary exploitation challenges which showcases concepts like basic stack-based buffer overflows, bypassing stack protections and even performing format string attacks.
